TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EdmPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class EdmPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute

Docs.summary: Base attribute for properties mapped to store elements. Implied default AttributeUsage properties Inherited=True, AllowMultiple=False, The metadata system expects this and will only look at the first of each of these attributes, even if there are more.
